mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 appMajorVersion, appMinorVersion, appBuildVersion, appFilename, contentMajorVersion, contentMinorVersion, contentMajorFilename, contentMinorFilename, appType, appB2CMajorVersion, appB2CMinorVersion, appB2CBuildVersion, storeUrl FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT APP_KEY, MAJOR_VERSION AS appMajorVersion, MINOR_VERSION AS appMinorVersion, BUILD_VERSION AS appBuildVersion, APP_TYPE AS appType, B2C_MAJOR_VERSION AS appB2CMajorVersion, B2C_MINOR_VERSION AS appB2CMinorVersion, B2C_BUILD_VERSION AS appB2CBuildVersion, STORE_URL AS storeUrl, CASE WHEN OS_CODE = 'iOS' THEN APP_ENV_FILE_NAME ELSE APP_FILE_NAME END appFilename FROM APP WHERE DEPLOY_TYPE = #{DEPLOY_TYPE} AND OS_CODE = #{OS_CODE} AND DISPLAY_TYPE IN ('ALL', #{DISPLAY_TYPE}) AND OS_VERSIONS like '%,'+#{VERSION}+',%' AND APP_KEY = #{APP_KEY} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) APP LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 APP_KEY as APP_KEY1, MAJOR_VERSION AS contentMajorVersion, MINOR_VERSION AS contentMinorVersion, dbo.FN_MAJOR_CONTENT_FILE_NAME(APP_KEY, MAJOR_VERSION) as contentMajorFilename, CASE WHEN VERSION_TYPE = 'MAJOR' THEN NULL ELSE CONTENT_FILE_NAME END contentMinorFilename FROM APP_CONTENT WHERE DEPLOY_TYPE IN ('REAL', #{DEPLOY_TYPE}) AND DISPLAY_TYPE IN ('ALL', #{DISPLAY_TYPE}) AND APP_KEY = #{APP_KEY} ORDER BY contentMajorVersion DESC, contentMinorVersion DESC ) TEMP ) CONTENT ON CONTENT.APP_KEY1 = APP.APP_KEY ) RESULT ORDER By appMajorVersion DESC, appMinorVersion DESC, appBuildVersion DESC
